Text:
Lulz. The show's finally back eh? I caught it a month ago.

Decent show, I'll probably continue to watch it.

Thx eztv, nice one love your torrents.

Can you upload the pilot episode too plz
would be great.
I thought this started april 1st? I have starz and all their ads say that.
is the same 1 that was on a month ago

so is this the pilot episode that came out a month ago? not complaining.. I actually want that one. I didn't catch it before and want to get into this show. From what I understand they aired the pilot a month ago and the the next new episode is April 1st?
Thanks :o) Can't wait for the next one. Love your stuff as it means I don't have to wait months & months before we get it on tv

@conebone April 1st was the official release date of it on starz they had a special 2hr premier where they played the first episode that they did a  month ago and then the second one was a brand new one. 

Show is awesome, i watched the first episode a month ago when it aired as the special sneak peek of the show and Joseph Fiennes is also a great actor, I loved him in flash forward and he looks amazing at playing merlin, which is the perfect part for him

STOP CHOPPING OFF END CREDITS.  Christ, there needs to be a universal rule to knock that $%!& off, forever, for all shows.  Jump-cutting from the dramatic moment of an end-scene right into the desktop is crap.  The end credits and music are there as a part of the experience - to transition the story's ending.  Saving those extra few megs of filesize is NOT worth it.  For F's sake...
got a copyright infringement email on both of eztv's camelot downloads, TPB is suddenly turning into a whore of "movie leaks" just to get your ip address

good show and great DL.

And fuck the infringment notices... does any one know of any Dl'er who's ever been arrested over it? coz i sure as hell aint.

Besides.. fuck em, greedy fuckers! On tv shows now'a'days they never even give us an ending, let lone a good one.

They can kiss my overly white ass!

Oh yeah.. thnx for all your hard work EZ.

You ARE the nuts!

I got a copy infringement email as well, be careful, they won't arrest you just cut your internet off.
